item.description:
Come on out and get some exercise! Walk 2.5 miles along the Charles River trail from Watertown center to Waltham, where we will eat at an authentic Mexican restaurant. We will walk at a moderate pace, and leashed dogs are welcome.

Meet on the Mt Auburn St bridge at 10 am. I will be wearing a red jacket. There is a municipal parking lot nearby just off of Main and Church St. where you can park for up to 8 hours. We will have 3 cars in Waltham to drive folks back to their cars in Watertown. There is also the option of taking bus # 70 directly back from Waltham to Watertown.

Look forward to meeting you there!

Greg
item.name: Charles River Walk
